pages.text: Ender Whales are friendly creatures and fly around in the void. They are rideable, even with a friend, and can get called with the Ender Flute. Get your hands on a chorus fruit and craft yourself a Chorus Fruit on a Stick to steer them in the direction you want
The Ender Flute is an old instrument to call Ender Whales for a ride
The Chorus Fruit on a Stick is a simple stick to steer Ender Whales since they love to eat those fruits
